benchmark_details.name: MusicInstruct (MI)
benchmark_details.overview: The MusicInstruct dataset comprises 60,493 Q&A pairs covering general questions related to music summarisation, as well as specific questions about music genres, moods, and instruments.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive dataset for training models capable of answering open-ended questions about music compositions.

data.source: Generated from music captions in the MusicCaps datasets using prompt engineering with ChatGPT.
data.annotation: Automatically generated using few-shot learning techniques.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated by comparing generated Q&A pairs to reference ones.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better alignment of generated responses to expected answers.
methodology.validation: Quality assessment conducted on a random 1% sample with metrics for clarity, feasibility, and practicality.
